entry.title: The Price
entry.summary:
Author: dante0220

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,127Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 9

Summary: In the "Wicked Day", Merlin tries to save Uther's life. As Emrys, he tries to cast the healing spell. Unfortunately, Morgana's necklace contains an *extra* twist. As both healing spell and aging spell go wrong, Merlin is forced to flee. Kilgarrah takes him to safety. Mithian and Rodor grant him sanctuary. There Merlin realizes still more about his secondary royal destiny.

entry.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Time
entry.summary:
Author: HarmonyOfTheSpheres

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,656Chapters: 8/21Kudos: 266

Summary: Merlin has returned to Hogwarts for his second year as the History of Magic professor, and this time he is determined to find a way to destroy the horcrux within Harry before it's too late. It's not exactly a simple task, however, especially with an escaped convict on the loose and dementors lurking around Hogwarts' grounds. So when Merlin finally gets a chance to change Harry's fate, he takes it.A bit of time travel is surely worth the risk if it will save Harry's life—isn't it?

entry.title: Some Truths Cannot Be Hidden
entry.summary:
Author: turtleduckmerlin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,559Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 114

Summary: A dagger Arthur finds hidden in Merlin’s chambers fills him with unease. Already burdened by Merlin’s absence, Arthur faces mounting tension within the council. Despite his tough exterior and foul mood, he strives to hold Camelot together while grappling with growing doubts about Merlin’s secretive behavior.After a grueling training session with the knights, Arthur retreats to reflect on Merlin’s frequent “tavern” visits, a mystery made all the more puzzling by Gaius’s repeated use of the excuse. As the days pass, Arthur’s suspicions deepen.Some truths cannot be hidden.

entry.title: Secrets, Burdens, and Other Things We Share
entry.summary:
Author: kiera_wesley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,870Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 78

Summary: To say Arthur was having a terrible, horrible, no-good, very bad day was putting it lightly. It started out with the pixie in the pantry, which sounded like one of Gwaine’s inane drinking songs but was in actuality an unmitigated disaster of flour, chaos, flying apples, and wasted pastries… … An unfortunate incident with a pixie leads to Arthur and Merlin swapping bodies for a day. When Merlin’s closely guarded secrets surface in the process, it’s up to Arthur to figure out how to proceed. Trust, love, protection, they’re all forms of the same thing, aren’t they? And what of secrets, burdens, and all the lies we keep to ourselves? This is a story about what would happen if we chose to pull off the veil and step, together, into the light.

entry.title: is it all we've ever been?
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,239Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: And, at the very center of Merlin’s attention, was the one who must be his soulmate, the very cause of this color.This was the moment he had been waiting for.Arthur would choose him, he had to. There was no universe where he wouldn’t fall for Merlin. It was inevitable; they fit together too perfectly for it to end any other way.But, god, he wanted it so badly.Or; Merlin longs to be with Arthur, his soulmate, so desperately that he’d do anything to stay in his life. But Arthur already has a soulmate, and the thought consumes Merlin, haunting him with the cruel truth that he was too late for the one love that was meant to be his.

entry.title: delicate
entry.summary:
Author: greysunset

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,343Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: ‘we might make out when nobody’s there // it’s not that we’re scared, it’s just that it’s delicate’ The University of Camelot, most highly ranked collegiate institution in England. Dwelling of the legendary football team, the Camelot Lions; renowned for a world-class library of ancient manuscripts; situated on the grounds of an ancient medieval castle. But, most importantly, for the next three years, home to Arthur Pendragon and Merlin d’Ealdor. Though the school grounds are picturesque, legends hint to a less than beautiful secret hidden beneath the university. Ancient energies lie beneath the foundations, whispering and waiting for a cursed soul to unleash them. Merlin and Arthur are bonded in more than just one way - not only their shared destiny, but also a secret love...

entry.title: Jenny Grinteeth
entry.summary:
Author: Ginkgo_Biloba_Baggins

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,562Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 170

Summary: “Never wander alone, my darling, or Jenny Grinteeth will get you,” Hunith used to say. “Or if you forget, make sure you say the rhyme - that wards her off.”   Jenny Grinteeth leave me be, my mother loves me, leave me be.   Jenny Grinteeth is a game they play. But as Merlin is sucked into life at Camelot, he wanders alone more than ever. He is surrounded by people, but he doubts they love him; they can’t really even know him. The loneliness becomes so routine, he forgets his mother’s warnings and the funny, little rhymes, which might otherwise have saved his life.

entry.title: You Can't Break Me (I'm already broken)
entry.summary:
Author: RayGracy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,647Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: "Take heart, for when Albion's need is greatest, Arthur will rise again."Arthur does indeed "rise again," but not where Merlin was expecting him to, not where Merlin has been waiting for 1500 years. Instead, he shows up in present day Beacon Hills, the prat.
